roleset.name: threaten, put into danger

example.name: normal usage
example.text: [The Conservatives-1] don't dare *trace*-1 jeopardize marginal Tory seats in Coventry, where Jaguar has headquarters...
example.arg: marginal Tory seats in Coventry , where Jaguar has headquarters

roleset.note: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with threaten. No VN class. Framenet class endangering. Updated 12/10 by Katie.
